definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
there is nothing the determined person can't accomplish (idiom)/persistence will overcome
pinyin: shi4 shang4 wu2 nan2 shi4 , zhi3 pa4 you3 xin1 ren2
containing_words.word: 世上無難事，只怕有心人

sentences.english: I strongly believe that Japanese high school girls are the sexiest female living creature in this world.
sentences.chinese: 我深信日本女子高生是世上最性感的雌性生物。

sentences.english: Talent never goes unrecognized, through constant endeavour will it be seen.
sentences.chinese: 世上沒有懷才不遇，只看你是否百分百爭取。

sentences.english: The shortest mantra of this world is the name of a person.
sentences.chinese: 世上最短的咒文，是一個人的名字。

sentences.english: There are few men in this world who get mad at graceful women.
sentences.chinese: 這個世上恐怕很少有男人會對閒雅的女人發脾氣。

sentences.english: As soon as the captain heard the sound of the lock being turned, he stepped forward.
sentences.chinese: 一聽到鎖的轉動聲，船長就立刻一步跨世上前去。

sentences.english: He turns you adrift on the world with surprising alacrity.
sentences.chinese: 他以令人驚奇的喜愛任你在世上漂泊。

sentences.english: Ever since armies began dressing in Western-style uniforms, men around the world have adapted Western-style work clothes.
sentences.chinese: 自從軍隊開始穿上西裝，世上的男人已經接受了西裝。

sentences.english: You're a goddam swordboat captain! Is there any thing better in the world?
sentences.chinese: 你是一船之長，世上還有比這更美妙的景象嗎？

sentences.english: Actually, it's the most difficult that you yourself are a mountain to climb over.
sentences.chinese: 每個人都是一座山，世上最難攀越的山其實是自己。

sentences.english: Character is one of the greatest motive powers in the world.
sentences.chinese: 品格乃是世上最偉大的行動力之一。

sentences.english: There was no better paddler , no better steersman than my brother.
sentences.chinese: 這世上再找不到比他更好的槳手和舵手了。

sentences.english: After his wife's death,he was alone in the world.
sentences.chinese: 妻子去世後，他在這世上就孑然一身。

sentences.english: And king Solomon passed all the kings of the earth in riches and wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 所羅門王的財富和智慧，勝過世上的列王。

sentences.english: All the money in the world cannot bring back yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 傾盡世上所有的金錢也無法挽回昨天。

sentences.english: Make you a grateful person by knowing people's needs around the world.
sentences.chinese: 報紙使您因爲知道世上人的需要而懂得惜福感恩。

sentences.english: There is really no such thing as bad weather, only different kinds of good weather.
sentences.chinese: 世上實無惡劣天氣，只有好天氣的種種不同罷了。

definition: the world/this world/the world of the living
great wide world/marvelously diverse world/(Buddhism) cosmos (abbr. for 三千大千世界[san1 qian1 da4 qian1 shi4 jie4])
this life/to lose face/to be disgraced
